The RealReal | San Francisco ONSITE | Lead and Sr. Product Engineers

As Director of Consumer Products Engineering at the leader in luxury consignment, I’m hiring frontend-leaning, full-stack Rails engineers.

These are both great opportunities to: * lead-by-example in a small (~5) team, * mentor junior and mid-level engineers, * bring Best Practices to bear, and * engineer solutions ahead of our anticipated IPO

For the Lead role, I’m particularly interested in someone who has opinions on React/Webpack/ES6/SPAs.

The RealReal has a proven business model, is Series E-stable, and our HQ is located on the sixth floor of a building near Fisherman’s Wharf with sweeping panoramic views of the bay.

Interview process : 1) phone screen 2) coding challenge 3) onsite 3) offer

Lead Ruby On Rails Engineer https://www.therealreal.com/careers/75F0BCC293

Senior Ruby On Rails Engineer https://www.therealreal.com/careers/D4ECA74BAC
